<noinclude>
This template creates a version switcher navigation box for pages that exist across multiple versions.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{VersionSwitcher|page=Docker_Installation}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''page''' - The base page name (without version namespace prefix)

The template will create links to the same page in all version namespaces.
